story:
Short Summary

The World needs honey bees plain and simple 1/4 of our food crops are directly pollinated by bees and they are in crisis. 

I was a successful bee keeper until the introduction of the Varola Distructor mite into our area. loss of production and dead bees made me all but give up.  But I have decided to rebuild in an area that is not yet plagued by the mites with uninfected bees.  I have 155 acres that was heavily logged several years ago and I bought the property with the intent to clean the scrub brush off and turn it into bee forage land.  Unfortunately The task is to big to do with out dedicated equipment built for the purpose. The money raised will fund the equipment fuel and seed to put the land into a condition that will support 150 colonies of bees.  I was averaging 100 pounds of honey per year before the infestation so we are talking 15000 pounds of honey into the local market, a substantial amount.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • The funds required are $60000.  20000 for a crawler/dozer to hook out the roots and stumps.  20000 for a mulcher to clear the brush without the need for scraping the soil and with the added benefit of turning the mulch back into the soil. $10000 towards fuel to get the job done and $10000 to seed the acreage to white clover.
  • The perks you get will be some of the best honey you have ever tasted without chemical residue all natural unpasteurized. And bees wax  candles that you cant compare.
  • If my goal is not reached the money will go toward manually clearing the land at a much slower pace and pore results

The Impact

The success of this campaign will provide a much needed source of income for my family:

  • The products produced will fill a much sought after product for the local area and will take pressure off of world markets.
  • I have been a successful beekeeper in the past and studied under one of the best beekeepers in the province.
  • I have all the other tools and resources to complete a project of this magnitude.  I have hives that are not even put together and have never been used.  I just need to clear this land to make the forage area.

Risks & Challenges

The challenges that I face are what if I am re infected by some stray colony that is infested.

  • I have the skill set to deal with this problem.
  • First I plan on using smaller cell size comb which interrupts the mites breeding cycle. Secondly I have contributed to another related campaign who sells Solar Hives that has proven effective at destroying mites.
  • I use solar powered electric fencing to keep the bears away and use elevated stands to protect the colonies from skunks.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Use your contacts through social media to get the word out.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Do you believe the world can be a better place?

If your answer is YES, then please keep reading...  

 

Hi.  I'm Ally

You may not know my name or my face, but you and I have talked before.  I'm that voice in your head that says "aww" when you see or hear about a kind act or a loving gesture.  I've always been here for you, but now I need your help.  Please be here for me!

See, I'm both obsessed and passionate about a mission.  I want to showcase One Million Good Deeds!

I wholeheartedly believe that if we all do even a little,  it can add up and we can make the world a better place. 

We focus so much on the bad even though there is so much good in the world.  I know the bad has to be reported and talked about, but I want the good of humanity to be shared as well.

I am hoping for 1 million good deed stories.  I'm even willing to be seen so people can know who I am.  

I have contacted a manufacturer and they are currently making me into an adorable stuffed toy. I will also have my magic coin made into cloth and in my hand.  See, I'm ready to meet the world.  Are you ready to share me?

 

What can one person do?

SO MUCH!

Good deeds are contagious. People who witness good deeds are more likely to do good deeds themselves. Imagine if we made these small acts of kindness more public. How many witnesses would start to spread more love with their good deeds?

  • Do you know someone who is an amazing person and gives with their heart?  Show them your appreciation and let them know you care by giving them my magic coin and even giving them me!  I'm too cute not too share, right?  Then, share your story on my facebook page to encourage others to act the same:  https://www.facebook.com/OneMillionGoodDeedChal...
  • Do you have a family member that always goes above and beyond?  Go the extra mile for them and give them the magic coin and me!  Won't they be surprised?  Then, share your story on my facebook page to encourage others to act the same:  https://www.facebook.com/OneMillionGoodDeedChal...
  • How about a co-worker who is always there to lend a hand?  What a better way to reward them than to give them me and my coin?  I'm sure they would display it proudly!  Then, if you wouldn't mind, please share their story on my facebook page:  https://www.facebook.com/OneMillionGoodDeedChal...
  • Do you belong to a group or organization?  How about getting everyone involved and on the lookout for good deeds?  Then, share the stories with the world on my facebook page:  https://www.facebook.com/OneMillionGoodDeedChal...
  • Are you an employer and want to raise community involvement?  Start the motivation by challenging them to find good deeds and share their stories!  Then, if you wouldn't mind, please share your story on my facebook page:  https://www.facebook.com/OneMillionGoodDeedChal...
  • How about those strangers you see doing things so amazing your heart twinges?  If you have my magic coins in your pocket, you will be ready to show those people that someone recognizes their contributions to making the world a better place.  Show that you are an honored witness by sharing their good deeds on my facebook page:  https://www.facebook.com/OneMillionGoodDeedChal...

There are so many ways to bring about change and one of the most effective ways is to show the good in the world.

Hate never fixed anything but LOVE has!

 

Perks

 

Wristband - wear this proudly to show you are doing your part to make the world a better place and are on the look-out for good deeds!  Comes in adult sizes 1/2".  However, if you are in need of child sizes, please just let us know.  We gladly will accommodate you to help bring the youth into this mission!

 

 

Magic coin - made of brass metal and is 1.75" in diameter.  Put some in your pocket and be ready for that moment when you see a good deed and can show you are honored to have witnessed a kind heart!

 

 

Ally

I am currently in production.  I will be standing at an adorable 12" high.  I will be a soft white with scattered grey on me (because I have lived in the shadows for so long).  I will be holding a cloth version of my magic coin.  I am squishy and lovable and I can stand on my own...

 

 

 

 

Funds

 

 

Stretch Goals

Can there every be too much goodness?  No!

The more people participating in this campaign, the better the world will be.  

Because the funds are being used mostly for production, shipping and marketing, there can never be too many orders.  Any remaining money, after expenses, will be used to create an app/game that will focus on the real life adventures of the good deeds shared.  The actual game will depend on what stories are shared.  Therefore, notices will be given to all backers if there are enough funds in the pool to create a game.  When that happens, all backers will be able to give input into the game concept and design.  

 

End Goal
 

We truly want to highlight 1 Million Good Deed stories on our Facebook page.  We know this is a big goal and isn't going to happen overnight but when people stand together for a cause, great things happen.  Part of humanity is to reach deep inside and build our dreams.  Isn't the common dream most of us share to live in peace and understanding and to respect differences? If we look to the good in people, we can form better understanding.  Better understanding leads to tolerance, which leads to peace.  

Please like our Facebook page and share the stories of good deeds!

https://www.facebook.com/OneMillionGoodDeedChallenge/

 

Let's make the news instead of just watching it.  Together we can do this!!!!!

story:
Short Summary

Hello:

My name is Emmanuel John, a native of Haiti, USA resident for nearly four decades. I need help to create jobs in Haiti and assist heads of families to be gainfully employed, care for their children, and help their neighbors.

You can contribute a simple donation for the operations of our employment agency in Haiti; or you can sign up for our program that covers your family and you for Emergency Medical Transpotation locally and worldwide.

Our company offers a membership that you will find invaluable to you and your family, as a supplement to your healthcare coverage to protect you against the high cost of ground or air ambulance service whenever or wherever a need should arise. Whether you are at home, at work, or while traveling worldwide. for details go to www.ubehl.com 

25% of all subscription goes to support our mission in Haiti.

If you prefer to donate, please click the "BACK IT" tab below to make your secure donation.

Subscribing to our program is a winning proposition for both you and us, or

Donations as much as $5 to $100 will help tremendously. Each $100 of contribution will prepare someone to find employment through our agency.

I seek to raise $10,000 in this campaign for job training and professional development of 100 people. in the past three (3) years we have trained 300 people, who are now working in different fields of employment and earning above minimum wages.

What We Need & What You Get.

You help us meet our goal by either joining our emergency medical transportation that covers you worldwide at great discounts or by given us a donation of your choice to help fight poverty.

We will post videos of the active symposium to show what we're doing with the funds that you provide or in response to your subscription in our Ambulance program.

The Impact

There is a Chinese adage, "Give a man a fish and he'll eat for a day. Teach him to fish and he'll eat for a lifetime."

Your contribution will help to teach someone to fish and make a difference in many lives.

To support with a donation, simply click BACK IT to the secure donation template.

To subscribe to the Emergency Medical Transportation, send us an email at info.ubehl@yahoo.com and we'll send you a secure application. You will receive 45% discount through www.ubehl.com

    Risks & Challenges

    Getting funding to run a business in Haiti poses serious challenges as it takes time and much resources to get our project to profit. The difficulties encountered are due to the company operating overseas,

    Please sign up for our worldwide emergency transportation membership to get us to the next level.

    The main risk to our effort is not being able to fund our project. Nevertheless, with your help we can achieve.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

    • Ask others to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
    • Copy and paste this page to your network and ask for their support for the project.
    Thank you for your interest in helping our effort.

    Best regards,

    Emmanuel John

If you prefer to donate, please click the "BACK IT" tab below to make your secure donation.Subscribing to our program is a winning proposition for both you and us, orDonations as much as $5 to $100 will help tremendously. Each $100 of contribution will prepare someone to find employment through our agency.
I seek to raise $10,000 in this campaign for job training and professional development of 100 people. in the past three (3) years we have trained 300 people, who are now working in different fields of employment and earning above minimum wages.
What We Need & What You Get. 
You help us meet our goal by either joining our emergency medical transportation that covers you worldwide at great discounts or by given us a donation of your choice to help fight poverty.We will post videos of the active symposium to show what we're doing with the funds that you provide or in response to your subscription in our Ambulance program.
  The Impact There is a Chinese adage, "Give a man a fish and he'll eat for a day. Teach him to fish and he'll eat for a lifetime."
Your contribution will help to teach someone to fish and make a difference in many lives.
To support with a donation, simply click BACK IT to the secure donation template.
To subscribe to the Emergency Medical Transportation, send us an email at info.ubehl@yahoo.com and we'll send you a secure application. You will receive 45% discount through www.ubehl.com    Risks & Challenges  Getting funding to run a business in Haiti poses serious challenges as it takes time and much resources to get our project to profit. The difficulties encountered are due to the company operating overseas, 
Please sign up for our worldwide emergency transportation membership to get us to the next level.
The main risk to our effort is not being able to fund our project. Nevertheless, with your help we can achieve. Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Ask others to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. Copy and paste this page to your network and ask for their support for the project.
  Thank you for your interest in helping our effort.Best regards, Emmanuel John

story:
As you know, we had a campaign earlier in the year and it was a success. https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/help-hillsbo... . We used the money raised for our current progress and it has helped us out a lot. 

We are delighted in the newest progress of our construction. We have uncovered the original ceiling tiles and removed the plaster from the brick walls. We have found the original brick that was made right here in Hillsborough! We are super excited to share with you this wonderful space. 

In the last few months, many of you have asked us what you can do to help us with our big move. We are working with some of the best contractors, plumbers, electricians, HVAC, engineers, and architects to make this space truly special for everyone. But certain costs have come up and we need your help. 

We are so thankful for the first campaign and it was a success for us. Thank you to all that contributed the first time around! We love you. This time, we are asking for a little help and with that the perks are even better! 

Here are some before pictures of our space

H

We have taken down all the walls, ceilings and floor. We've put in a new floor, put dry wall up in the back deck, new electricity and plumbing. Plus, a new kitchen space right in our cafe! Our goal is to bake fresh goodies every morning with your coffee drink. Salty chocolate chip cookies everyday! 

With these great accomplishments, certain costs have added up and we want our space to be the best space for you, the community. Your contribution would help with new windows for the front of the space, better plumbing including a bigger dishwasher, more space for the baked goods, more tables including outside tables, an air conditioner in the back kitchen and post demo work in our current space. 

We know that not everyone can contribute, please share to your friends and help get the word out! 

Our goal is to be open by October 4th for the public. Here is our newest development!

story:
Our great wealth is in nature. We live in it and enjoy it as much as possible. We are especially enthusiastic about the coast and the sea as well as the lakes. Bathing and fishing relax and calm us.

Imagine being on a boat surrounded by a beautiful scenery! But if you don’t want or can’t swim and thus connect even more with the surroundings, it would help if you had a good view into the depths …

Maybe you’d like to merge with the surroundings completely.

In that case you need our product. ENVIRONMENT FRIENDLY, incredibly attractive, practical, TRANSPARENT AND UNBREAKABLE BOAT P A N O R A M I O.

After three years of planning, designing, and working we have made a product that will help you take the breath away of your acquaintances who will think that you are sitting on the surface and rowing!

You’ll enjoy using it tremendously while not disturbing the water life. The adventure will be all the more exciting because it enables a breath-taking view up to twenty meters deep.

If you are a passionate fisherman, your hobby will become even more interesting!


Rowing in it by night is especially attractive. By turning on the LED diodes you can also enjoy numerous romantic moments.

   

A                                                                                                                                    
Panoramio is a completely transparent boat made from an incredibly durable and blow-proof material – the polycarbonate, which is used in the production of combat airplane windshields, protective helmets, bullet-proof glass etc. The in-built frame gives this boat its firmness and form and is made of polished stainless steel. 

              

                                      


B

The transparent bottom enables you the unobstructed view of the wonderful underwater world. Whether you use it by yourself or in the company of another person.

Sitting in the boat isn’t strenuous because the seats are installed raised from the bottom and are very comfortable.  The ride is very stable and simple since the boat is very light.

                             

C

A shelf is installed in the middle of the boat where you can store beverages or you can stick a fishing rod into the opening.

You can also use our original solution for fishing – a nozzle. In this part of the boat you’ll also find the battery casing. The battery charges the lighting along the sides of the boat which enables pleasant night rides or fishing.


D

Maximal attention has been devoted to safety. In front and at the rear there are two airbags which prevent sinking, and they can be useful also for the user. Additionally, the bottom of the seat is made of unsinkable Styrofoam that can also be used for help.

Styrofoam   150 mm high, front and rear                                             

                  

                                                                     Two inflatable air bags front and rear

E

The boat can be used in several ways. Seats are movable and face any direction you want. This way you’ll always be able to find an appropriate and comfortable position. It can be steered with a double or single paddle.

Rowing standing up is also possible, just as rowing by sitting on the shelf.

1. Rowing standing up (SUP) or by sitting on shelf

                                             

2. Seats are movable in any direction you want. It can be steered with a double (two) or single paddle.

                     

F

A special handle on the frame enables easier boarding and exiting and safety fixing on the roof of your car. The anti-slip sheeting prevents slipping.

                


G

The transport of the boat from the water to the car is an easy task. Right before you reach the shore you simply get out of the boat and attach the stabilizer wheels. Then you roll it away. If you have the stabilizers, that is.

      You’ll have no trouble placing it on the roof of your car by yourself.           You attach it firmly with the aid of original clamps and off you go to somewhere else.

Before you drive away, remove the seats, paddles, airbags, net, front and rear handles, and the battery. Thus you’ll have no trouble driving within the speed limit of up to 130 km/h.

                      

          

Original four special handles for easier bording and in same time for easier and safetyer fixing on the roof of the car.

                                Remove stabilizer with wheels...

                                    


H

Using the boat by night is something special. With a switch you can turn the lighting on and off as you please. After a few days you simply recharge the battery and use it again. The battery has about 600 cycles of recharging and will thus serve you for several years. LED diodes are watertight but not completely waterproof, since such do not exist yet.

              

- LED diodes 2 meters, 12 V. White or Blue.

- Battery dim.: Lenght 150mmxHigh 90mm x Width 65 mm                                                                         AKU LEOCH 12V,  7.2 AH, Battery charger is added.



I

The boat’s outer surface is covered by a special ceramic coating which additionally protects the boat from minor scratches and UV rays. This special coating also makes sailing easier because it does not retain water on the surface.

The structure of the boat is such that in the combination with the stabilizer the bottom of the boat never touches the ground and thus doesn’t scratch the bottom. Nevertheless, careful use is advised to preserve the product scratchless for as long as possible.

Let me emphasize that potential scratches at the bottom are not visible during the use in the water!

         

If the boat does not have a stabilizer with wheels, we recommend turning it upside down and storing it in this manner while not in use.

Nevertheless, we have still designed such a structural solution that even if you put it on the ground there will be no major damage because the in-built stabilizers are convex thus preserving the middle of the boat undamaged.

J

Our tests prove that the hull is extremely resilient. See for yourself.


blow-proof material: airplane windshields etc. 

             

                                         


K

The product is made by a machine that we ourselves built for this purpose. A great part of every boat is hand-made and is valued as such. The extremely demanding, complex, and expensive procedure – like HITEC, we managed to produce with minimal means but with a great result. 

Designing and model/mould

        

            


Building the thermoforming/vacuum mashine 64KW, 6,1x2,05 meter

   


Our team will try their best to meet your expectations. All your potential wishes and comments will be carefully considered. Write to us or simply call.

                             

To realize our desire to launch the production and thus bring joy to many children,      fishermen, tourists, nature lovers etc. we need you.                                                                    To help us modernize the process, templates, tools, and promotion.

                                              


   
 -----------------------------------  IMPORTANT --------------------------------------------
          * If we don't reach our funding goal, you will still receive each paid                                                                   product or perk !

           Our future for 2016/2017

Panoramix is an 3m ECO electric motor high speed boat-for 2016/2017:

Manufacturing and Production:
Indiegogo projects are a risky undertaking and the reality is that they have the potential to encounter problems in the phases after funding.
We greatly appreciate the vote of confidence and trust our backers have put in us and in our project. We are working hard to avoid issues and have been planning a contingency strategy to get the products to the backers and fulfill our goal of getting more people rowing Panoramio boat.
Our combined experience and a network of resources will allow us to quickly react to eventual issues. More importantly, we are doing our homework beforehand so that we do not run into unexpected problems.
We have more than 25 years experience designing and manufactoring. 
  

                                        

           *If we don't reach our funding goal, you will still receive                                                                                                                                each paid product or perk !

story:
Project Overview

Some people like bruises. They can go play paintball. For everybody else, there’s Blaster Tag, a new entertainment option in Provo/Orem that combines the fun and strategy of paintball with the accessibility and safety of Nerf guns. 

Construction is already underway on our building, and we are anticipating a grand opening of Blaster Tag in late August or early September. The funds from this campaign will help us to finance some much-needed improvements to the customer experience that we will not be able to afford without your help. 

Pre-purchase games and parties here at a discount to help make Blaster Tag a reality!

Blaster Tag Description

Blaster Tag is played in a rectangular arena filled with obstacles. Players are divided into two teams and are equipped with Nerf guns that shoot soft foam discs. The two teams start on opposite ends of the arena and attempt to take out opposing team members by shooting them with a disc. Players that are shot must raise their hands in the air and exit the arena. Matches typically last between 5 and 10 minutes. Several game variations will be used within the Blaster Tag concept:

  • Last Team Standing – A team wins by eliminating all opposing players 
  • Last Person Standing – Once a team is eliminated, every man is for himself until there is only one player left standing 
  • Capture the Flag – A team wins by capturing the opposing team’s flag and bringing it back to the team’s base 
  • King of the Castle – A team wins by eliminating a designated player from the opposing team that is protected with a shield  

Blasters

The game uses Nerf Vortex line blasters that shoot soft foam darts. The Proton Blaster is included with admissions.

Location

Blaster Tag will be located at 1756 South State Street in Orem.

Spread the Word!

We are offering a FREE HOUR OF BLASTER TAG to everyone that helps us spread the word of our Indiegogo campaign. There are 3 easy steps to qualify for a free game:

  • Share our Indegogo campaign with all of your Facebook friends
  • Tag Blaster Tag in your Facebook post
  • Like Blaster Tag's Facebook page

Games can be redeemed in the first month of opening. You can find our Facebook page at the following address: https://www.facebook.com/blastertagorem or by clicking the Facebook link below.

About the Owners

Colin and Chad have a combined 10 years of experience living in the Provo/Orem area. From dollar-theater movies to bowling at Fat Cats, they have experienced every form of entertainment that the valley has to offer. As great as all of the entertainment options were, they felt that there was no one option that met all of their entertainment needs. They wanted something that they could do year-round that was affordable, active, accessible, and fun. After months of brainstorming, Colin and Chad discovered the concept of Blaster Tag and knew instantly it was the perfect fit. Please help Colin and Chad turn this business into a reality!

Stretch Goals

$5,000

Concessions! Stay hydrated between matches with a selection of snacks and beverages to purchase at the new concession stand.

$10,000

Optimized Sound System! The right sound system and song set-list can dramatically improve player performance in the arena.

$15,000

Optimized Spectator Viewing! Your fans will love watching you dominate in the arena with a new spectator dug-out.

$20,000  

Glow-in-the-Dark Blaster Tag! You will have a blast  shooting friends in the dark in our arena equipped with new blacklights and glow-in-the-dark equipment.

story:
Grassroots Partners is an NGO based in the Niger-Delta region of Nigeria.  We are reaching out to the poorest of the poor at the remotest rural areas to lift them out of abject poverty.  This NGO is set up by a group of civil society individuals who pull their resources together to help give skills and start up small business ventures for selected poor and helpless women and young adults at the grassroots with particular focus on widows, single mothers and the youth at the rural areas.  This organization is 100% people funded.

This campaign is a call-out to all people of goodwill to lend a hand to lift someone out of extreme poverty.  It is extremely important to us because it will provide us with the funds needed to reach out to the many helpless people whose hope of finally living a better life has been raised by their contact with us.

Your contributions will help us to establish, after necessary trainings to ensure sustainability, small business ventures for a targeted 60 poor and helpless rural widows/women and young people who, otherwise, would continue to have difficulties to survive in life and live life with dignity.  Your will give these helpless people a better life.

What We Need and why:

We need $50,000 to :

·  Pay for training materials and facilities;

·  Pay for tools/materials needed to start-up small business ventures for at least 60 selected beneficiaries;

·  Pay trainers and monitoring/supervising officers.

What You Get For Supporting Us:

Our unique Perks:  When you donate you will receive one of our unique perks specially home-made for our contributors as a token of our ppreciation/recognition for partnering with us in this project of assisting others to find and live a better life.  Our perks include:

-  Post Card -  $20 -and above

  Description:   A portrait of Calabar Rain Forest of Nigeria


  Customized hand-made “Thank You” Card (Small), Donate $100 - and above -(Made within our organization by one of our local skill trainers) 


Customized hand-made “Thank You” Card (Big)

 -Made within our organization by one of our local skill trainers); Donate $500 &above


Hand-woven cotton “Aso-oke” muffler  (specially handwoven for us by our indigenous Yoruba women here in Nigeria) - Donate $1,000 and above.


-  Customized hand-woven cotton “Aso-oke” muffler  (specially handwoven for you by our indigenous Yoruba women n Nigeria) - Donate $2,000 and above


If our goal is not reached:

If our goal is not reached we will only train and set up small business ventures for just a limited few that our resources can cover.  And that will dash into pieces the hope of the many rural women and youth who are already breathing a sigh of relief in high expectation of being assisted by our organization which is, hundred percent, operating with resources from concerned people.

Impact

Your contribution is not just very important for our project, it is also very significant because it will help to start up small business ventures for these rural women and youth thereby giving them something that will help them live life with dignity, lift them out of extreme poverty and reduce the world population of those wallowing in abject poverty.

-Your contribution will help to provide gainful employment for these women and young people and deter them from engaging in drugs, crime, terrorism and other vices harmful to the society;

-When you contribute you will be lending a hand to someone in need and that in itself gives a sense of fulfillment and self-worth. These people whose lives you touch will forever be grateful to you for helping to improve their lives.  You will also be contributing to poverty reduction in the world as a whole.

Our activities so far:

-Until recently, our initial initiative and activities consisted in collecting used household items such as clothings, furniture, utensils, etc. from rich households in the cities.  We mend, repair, refurbish these items where necessary and use them to set up petty trading ventures for selected rural women.  This also provides employment for some youth who are engaged at our charity outlets where some of these used items collected from rich households are distributed at little or no cost to the grassroots public . 

Other Ways to help

- Any amount is acceptable - $1, 5, 10, 15, 10,000, 20,000, etc, they are all invaluable to us;

-Talking about this campaign with your contacts, make as much noise about it as you can and encourage them to donate;

- Post our campaign on your social networks using the Indiegogo sharing tools.

                                                 DONATE NOW

           Your Perk will be sent to you in acknowledgment of your donation!

  JOIN TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN THE LIVES OF THE POOR AND HELPLESS,

story:
The University of Toledo Students for Justice in Palestine (UT-SJP) is a diverse group of students, faculty, staff, and community members who is committed to educating campus and the local communities about Palestinian human rights. UT-SJP provides students and community members the opportunity to actively engage in the process of pursuing social justice and encourages students to develop into conscious global citizens. Since its formation in 2011, UT-SJP has organized tremendously successful events and programming on campus and in the community such as:

-Academic panels and lectures on Palestine

-Film screenings 

-Events showcasing Palestinian culture and history

-Apartheid Wall simulations on campus

-Three successful annual fundraising dinners for Gaza and Palestinian refugees

Most importantly, UT-SJP successfully began a #UTDivest campaign in 2014, resulting in UT Student Government voting Yes for our divestment resolution with an overwhelming majority of 21-4! 

In order to continue UT-SJP's impact, we kindly ask for donations that will go toward covering  advertising, educational materials, building materials for our Apartheid Wall demonstrations, and other important costs. Anything helps!

We truly appreciate all the wonderful support we've received from individuals in both our community and across the world - please help us continue raising awareness about Palestine and promoting truth and justice. 

In solidarity,

UT-SJP

story:
WHAT IS AR OR AUGMENTED REALITY?

Augmented Reality (AR) allows for virtual reality to become a part of our real world using various technologies and devices. The methods range from extremely simple to what seems to be science fiction to most. The key to augmented reality is understanding multiple design platforms as well as hardware, lighting and interactive gaming creation.

Every aspect of AR has variables, even what triggers it. No matter the catalyst for which AR appears, a level of interactivity and entertainment is able to be achieved like never before. This is undeniably the future of advertising, engineering and much more. Entar4D.com will allow for any budget to take advantage of AR by offering $50.00-$500,000.00 services to continue our legacy for assisting local biz to have the tools to compete with corporate level companies. 

What ENTAR4D Needs! :)

We need Software, R n D, Hardware, Office Space, time, signage, advertising space, legal advisory, PPC/retargeting online ads, SEO listings and content optimization, full-scale video production for a professional commercial, oh... and a few more paid employees! 


----COST INFO----


The Funding is just enough to get the proper quality of the listed items.

16GB 1866MHz DDR3 ECC memory
1TB PCIe-based flash storage
Dual AMD FirePro D700 graphics processors with
6GB of GDDR5 VRAM each

    THIS WILL CHANGE OUR WORLD.... REALLY

    • Promotional Applications are amazing, but, the tip of the iceberg!
    • This successfully advances some of the largest brands and products with projection based AR for example.
    • New to the US... but in 1990 Professor Tom Caudell discovered it, most countries are utilizing Augmented Reality Heavily, the US is coming along!

    OBSTACLES

    The Projection Presentations can take a lot of set-up, expensive equipment, etc and is to be used on special occasions by those who can afford it.

    The 3D Modeling is great, getting those models to react and animate is a challenge.

    • Once funded, our team can focus... pure and simple. THIS IS MY PASSION, passion is something I have not felt in years, at least for work related topics.
    • This passion and the proper tools will make overcoming easy, WE WANT TO ASSIST IN THE GROWTH, USE, ENHANCEMENT AND  APPLICATION OF AR AS THE PUBLIC BECOMES FAMILIAR. This combines, strategy, design, animation, interactive elements, and #D like it has never been seen in any other technology. HELP US HELP THE US!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Want to be involved in any way?

    • Apply to become an intern.
    • Advanced in coding, modeling, etc. :) CALL US ASAP

    Entar4D.com    -    ROIdesignGroup.com    -    Spicelandia.co   -    615-516-0576

story:
If you care about cultivating compassion and mindfulness, you will love this project.

The Ayubowan Project aims to help needy people living in a slum of Mount Lavinia, Sri Lanka. It consists in the setting of a Free Humanitarian Health Clinic. The project starts at the end of November 2015.

The dwellers of this settlement located on the shore of Indian Ocean are living in total destitution. This fisherman village was at the front line of the 2004 Tsunami. It has been devastated. The ruins of the village still line the shore, 11 years later. 

The fishermen and villagers live with meager means. Entire families often survive on uncertain incomes of less than $20 per month, sometimes with the additional burden of extended family to support.

There is a chronic lack of water supply, electricity, waste management, and mainly, health services. These people are facing the most severe health challenges.

The start of the project is at the end of November 2015. The long-term goal is to make the project sustainable and create a permanent clinic located at a walking distance from the settlement.

Your donation can make the difference. 

Please help make this project happen. Donate now!

story:
LOVE GOOD FOOD? HELP US GROW YOUNG FARMERS!

We need a new generation of young farmers. Many current farmers are near retirement age, and that puts the future of the farm-to-fork food you love at risk.

FamilyFarmed is addressing this critical issue with our Help Us Grow Young Farmers! campaign. Make your tax-deductible donation today, and help us help farmers succeed at selling through farmers markets, CSAs, farm stands and other direct marketing venues.

Your dollars will enable our non-profit organization to build out our new Direct Market Success program. This includes an essential manual on business planning, production, handling, food safety and selling for farmers in direct marketing. And it includes a program to provide thousands of farmers with invaluable training to help them succeed.

Here is why you should trust FamilyFarmed to make this program work: We have done it before. Our long-running Wholesale Success program has trained more than 7,000 farmers in 35 states to succeed selling into wholesale food markets.

Both the Direct Market Success manual and the associated training program are modeled closely after Wholesale Success.



DONATE TO US, REWARD YOURSELF

Bringing new blood, new energy and new ideas for a healthier and more sustainable food system are good enough reasons for you to make a tax-deductible donation to our Help Us Grow Young Farmers! campaign. But wait… there’s fun!

Thanks to the generosity of FamilyFarmed’s many talented Good Food friends, we are pleased to offer an exciting list of “perks” to thank you for your donations.

They include very affordable prizes, such as gift certificates to Whole Foods Market and Chipotle Mexican Grill. For bigger donations, they include meals and other donations from award-winning chefs such as Chicago’s Rick Bayless,Paul Kahan,Carrie Nahabedian,Sarah Stegner,Paul FehribachandPaul Virant, who are pioneers in “farm to table” cuisine, and other great restaurants that specialize in local foods, such as Farmhouse Chicago.

And for a $250 donation, you can make like the president and pardon a Thanksgiving turkey, which will live out its natural life on the organic pastures of Illinois’ Mint Creek Farm.

FamilyFarmed has spent nearly two decades helping promote local, sustainable, humane and fair food. Direct Market Successis the latest among our initiatives that include the Good Food Festival & Conference, the Good Food Financing & Innovation Conference, the Good Food Business Accelerator, and the Wholesale Success program.

Please spread the word via Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and email. #GrowYoungFarmers…. and donate today!

has spent nearly two decades helping promote local, sustainable, humane and
fair food. Direct Market Successis the latest among our
initiatives that include the Good Food Festival & Conference, the Good Food
Financing & Innovation Conference, the Good Food Business Accelerator, and the Wholesale Success program.
Please
spread the word via Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and email. #GrowYoungFarmers….
and donate today!

story:
Short Summary

Anxiety and depression are very common mental illnesses.  In the United States alone, forty million adults suffer from anxiety, and 14.3 million struggle with depression.  You may even know someone who is debilitated by worries, fears and even panic attacks.

Most of us at some point experience sadness or loneliness.  However, when individuals do not even have the energy to get out of bed in the morning or when they feel unmotivated, overwhelmed, or helpless, they may be experiencing a major depression. Does this sound like someone you know?

There is nothing worse than being in a relationship filled with constant arguments and poor communication, a relationship that contains little more than pain and distance.  Sometimes couples may feel stuck in their relationship, believing that they are the only one who feels this kind of loneliness.  Fifty percent of couples in committed relationships end-up separating because they do not receive support and guidance.

However, there is hope! Studies have shown that counseling is very effective in helping individuals overcome their fears, in reducing feelings of despair and hopelessness. 

My name is Rossana Sierra-Swiech, and I am a Licensed Clinical Therapist with a private practice and more than 13 years of experience.  I know what it is like to live with anxiety and how detrimental it can be to living a life of joy and fulfillment.  I know because I watched with sadness for years as a close family member suffered from anxiety.  After much encouragement, he sought help, and he has since learned skills that allow him to effectively manage his anxiety.  This is my reason for wanting to reach out to others, to offer them hope and the promise of a better tomorrow.

Unfortunately, one third of Americans suffering from anxiety, depression or relational problems do not receive counseling because they are uninsured or have too little income.  My vision is to provide counseling services to anyone who wants them, regardless of their financial situation.  I’d like to ask you to partner with me to make this possible.  Join me in bringing hope and freedom to the lives of others so they can live a fulfilling life. Your contributions will give individuals the opportunity to receive counseling services, therefore offering them the gift of hope.   PLEASE NOTE THAT THE EXAMPLE OF THE CLIENT ON THE VIDEO IS IN NATURE HYPOTHETICAL AND AND EXAMPLE OF THE CLIENTS I SEE.


What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to raise $60,000, which will make it possible for 30 individuals or couples to receive weekly counseling service for an entire year.  If I do not reach my entire goal, I will use your donations to provide services for as many people as I can with the funds available.  
The following is a breakdown of how your donations will subsidize weekly therapy sessions for an individual or a couple.
$160.00 = 1 month of weekly sessions.
$320.00 = 2 months of weekly sessions. 
$960.00 = 6 months of weekly sessions.
$1920.00 = 1 year of weekly sessions. 
Aside from the gratification that you will have by bringing hope to the life of another, I do have some perks to express my gratitude to you.  Check out the "Perks" section for details.

The Impact

You can make a difference in the life of another person!  You have the ability to reach out to someone and bring hope to his/her life!  With your donations, you can make this world a better place!  

With more than 13 years of experience in working with individuals who have suffered from anxiety, depression or broken relationships, I have witnessed transformation and freedom as they have received counseling services.  

"Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin". -Mother Theresa

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways that you can help.  Tell your friends (facebook, instagram twitter) how they can give hope to those who feel hopeless.  Share my campaign with those you know.

story:
Who we are and what we're offering

Nxt Robotics is made up of a group of roboticists and designers from a variety of professional fields. Our interests and backgrounds shaped Nixie into a versatile and unique robot. Nixie is a mobile intelligent platform for the home and office. The role that Nixie plays in your home and office is determined by YOU. The way that Nixie looks can be decided by YOU. When Nixie is described as a personal, customizable robot, we mean it.  We’re offering Nixie as early-bird, pre-holiday, customize body, and crowdfunding pricing. 


Benefits

It takes great applications to make hardware great. We created a full package of applications to take complete advantage of Nixie's extensive list of capabilities. Here is a list of the applications and their benefits:


Our Mission

At Nxt Robotics, our goal is to put a robot in every household and positively impact the ways in which we interact with technology. One of the driving forces behind Nixie was enhancing our everyday lives. Nixie is able to fill multiple roles within a household or office such as a learning aid, security guard, personal assistant, and much more.

Everyone at Nxt Robotics wants to build and sell robots. More than that, we want to make robotic technology accessible and affordable to everyone, everywhere. Every individual, household, and office has different needs. Nixie fills the gaps while enhancing the lives of those around Nixie.


Nixie In Hospitals

One of our passions resides around helping children - specifically children in hospitals. Our goal is simple: for every 25 Nixies that are sold, we'll donate 1 Nixie to a Children's Hospital. 

One of our perks, "Nixie Heals Children" allows contributors to purchase 2 Nixie's (for a total of $998 ) and donate one to a Children's Hospital. The donor has the option of having their name (or logo) permanently placed on the body. 

Nixie's Journey

Nixie was originally designed by Jeff as a robot for his family. Jeff initially conceived of a small robot that could assist his family in ways traditional technology could not. Jeff consulted his friends, family and colleagues for input in what they would want a robot to do around their house or office. After receiving feedback and researching how robotic technology can enhance lives, Jeff set out to take Nixie from the concept stage into physical reality. Gathering a dynamic team of creative minds, Nixie’s body and  technology were designed and assembled. However, Nixie’s journey is far from finished. The next phase of Nixie’s journey is now up to you.


We Care About Privacy and Security


It's not enough to simply bring devices into our lives - we need to make sure that we don't introduce new ways to unexpectedly reduce privacy. Nixie incorporates a "Privacy Mode" that is enabled via speech or a mobile device. For instance, you can simply say “Ok Nixie, Privacy Mode" and if Nixie is facing you it will turn completely away and disable its camera for a set period of time (you can set the privacy timeout). If you forget to tell Nixie to come out of privacy mode, don't worry - after the preset privacy time has expired Nixie will be back to its  normal interactive mode.

Our software development team has a strong background in application and network security. We understand that Nixie will be in your homes and offices as well as our homes and offices. We want to make sure that personal spaces stay private. Software security is one of the most important tenets of our development team and will continue to be with each new upgrade, app, and feature.


A Little Bit of Our History

As Nixie’s prototype development progressed, the team was convinced they had created something special.  They found that Nixie is so much fun to be around that it would be great to offer it to the world. And so we embarked on a fun and amazing adventure...


Planning/review sessions



The birth of Nixie's design



Additional Connectivity 

Nixie's development team has been hard at work with designing and testing control to/from Nixie with the following 3rd party products:  

Controlling Nixie with the human brain
  • Interaxon Muse 


  • NeuroSky MindWave 


Displaying videos or other visual information to a connected television or monitor
  • Chromecast (via NixieCast™) 
NOTE: See FAQ section for where to purchase these devices separately.

Making Nixie YOURS

Nixie's body has 30 strong rare earth magnets embedded inside. 

That means that you can add metallic or magnetic parts that will stay in place as Nixie move's about its location. 

Also, Nixie's face is able to be easily customized to whatever you like... Below are a few examples of the faces (with blinking eyes) that you can configure on Nixie. Life doesn't always have to be so serious - have a little fun! 

  

  

  
In addition to all of the fun goodness, we can also customize Nixie for you. Simply choose the Custom Nixie perk and tell us how you'd like your Nixie accessorized. 
 

Perks!


Our Amazing Team


Jeff Debrosse (Founder and CEO) - Jeff's background spans multiple disciplines ranging from cybersecurity to software engineering, robotics, machine learning, AI and embedded systems. Jeff has also successfully led the design, build and deployment of hardware and software products. At the end of the day it's all about family, robots and motorcycles - in that order.


Raymond LeBlanc (Director of Software Engineering) - Ray is a software developer that specializes in application security, computer vision, and software architecture.


Jody Shannon (Creative Director) - Jody is the quintessential artist, his background is in traditional cell animation, digital painting and animation. A passion for robots grew from SciFi films which inspired him to design robots that can and will seamlessly integrate into everyday life.


Kayla Snyder (Social Media Coordinator) - Kayla is a recent graduate of the Eller College of Management at the University of Arizona. With a background in marketing she is focused on creating an engaging and well rounded social media presence for NXT Robotics.


Accolades

      

SDVG Cool Company Press Release

About the Robot Launch 2015 Startup Competition


Technical Specs


FAQ

Q. When will my Nixie ship?

A. Nixie early-bird order fulfillment will begin in the late November/early December timeframe on a first-ordered, first-shipped basis. NXT Robotics, Inc. will provide update notifications of your Nixie ship date.


Q. What devices does Nixie work with?

A. Nixie's interface is web-based and mobile-enhanced so it can be used from any modern mobile device (phones & tablets) as well as any computer using Windows/Linux/OS X . He also has a web interface so you can interact via computer.


Q. How soon can we start purchasing accessories from Nixie? 

A. There will be a number of accessories available from our Nixie store shortly after general shipping begins. We will update everyone prior to the opening of the Nixie store, but remember - you can easily give Nixie a look and feel that's all your own! 


Q. Are there additional apps that we can download for Nixie? 

A. The extra apps will be available when the Nixie store opens (or shortly before it opens). You'll be able to download both free and paid apps. 


Q. Is there a bundle for the EEG (electroencephalogram) headsets or Google's Chromecast? 

A. These are 3rd-party devices that we don't resell. Here are the URLs for the respective products:

  • Interaxon Muse: www.choosemuse.com
  • NeuroSky MindWave: http://store.neurosky.com/
  • Google Chromecast: http://www.google.com/chromecast

Q. Is there an API/SDK that developers can use to build applications or modify Nixie's system? 

A. We will be releasing both in the near future. Stay tuned for more information! We'll add a sign-up page and direct everyone there so we directly update everyone with details.  



Nixie - The Secure and Adaptable Personal Robot


A big thank you from Nixie and the team!  :) 

Other Ways You Can Help Spread the Word!

Please help us get the word out! Indiegogo has some great sharing tools and if you're already on social media, simply follow, like and forward updates:

  • Twitter: tweet with the hashtags: #nixie imagiNIXIE
  • Instagram: Follow and forward updates from nxt_robotics
  • Facebook: NXT Robotics
  • Use the Indiegogo sharing tools below!

story:
Antigua Guatemala...

Hello! 

As you may know, Guatemala is a BEAUTIFUL country full of life and colors, hardworking and humble people.

The Antigua Guatemalan economy relies on agriculture and hardworking artisans that make up more than half of the country's economy. The informal economy is essential, and is mainly made up of the following:

- Agriculture 

- Textiles

- Fishing 

- Commerce 

- Handcrafting

Hand-crafters create beautiful things with textiles. Hand-crafting faces a serious risk. They (hand-crafters) are not generating enough income to sustain their families, forcing them to look for alternative occupations, shrinking one of Guatemala's biggest markets. 


So we came up with this idea!

Searching for hand-crafters in need we found Doña Graciela. 

Doña Graciela is a 74 year old hard-working hand-crafter woman who has a disease in her nerves. This disease has a direct impact in her eyes, affecting her skills at hand-crafting. 

She owns a retail store in Antigua, Guatemala. 

We want to raise money to help her Guatemalan art selling business grow and finance her medical expenses due to the fact that she can't afford them. 


This is important for us because we really like to help others. If we have the opportunity to help, then we will. The only reason we do this public is because we don't have the money. 

We are a group of Guatemalan teenagers that feel the obligation to do something for our country. We truly believe this world could be a better place, one country at a time. Starting with Guatemala.


What We Need & What You Get

Primarily, we need to help Doña Graciela with her illness, then with her business. She has so much talent that is not recognized worldwide. Because her hand made products have so much potential, we as a group, will help her in the recognition of her products:

  • We need $3,000
- $1,000 for Graciela's illness (Medical checkups + treatment)
- $1,000 for the products she's selling
- $1,000 for the store upgrade
  • As you can see, we have unique Guatemalan perks that you will not be able to find outside Guatemalan territory  (take a look at the gallery)! So besides helping, you will be recompensed not only by helping someone in need, but also by obtaining Guatemalan unique and original products! Thus, we have an incredible variety to offer, from bags and purses to original paintings only found in Guatemala.  Invite your friends to contribute! :)

As said, the funds will go to finance Doña Graciela's business and her struggling disease.

The Impact

Even though this campaign is specifically to help Doña Graciela get through her disease and help her business, we believe it will also help the Guatemalan hand-crafting business to be recognized globally.


Risks & Challenges

The obstacles we might encounter regarding the campaign could be Doña Graciela's health might suffer a wrong turn. By helping us as soon as posible, we can prevent this kind of event and help boost her business to obtain a good income. 

Besides Graciela's health we will also notify you the challenges and obstacles that we may face while doing this project by mail.

Also, the Guatemalan postal service may not be efficient enough, so we might experience some delay with the shipping of some perks.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute don't worry, that doesn't mean you can't help! 

By sharing this on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ or mail you could help us make some noise about this campaign and you could help Doña Graciela get better and improve her quality of life :) 

Use Indiegogo's share tools. You would be surprised by the power of social media! 


THANK YOU!! :)

story:
Presenting our Brand Ambassador VH1's Atlanta Exes Christina Johnson

You have no idea how excited I am to represent this amazing liqueur. I want you all to know that you're donating to a brand that you will love and be proud of knowing you participated in the development. Trust me you will soon be sipping with me and saying OuOui! - Christina Johnson

Our Perks will make you Say OuOui! (OooYes)

          

A portion of your contributions will help support our nonprofit partner Blanket of Freedom. See more below on how they help veterans.

Island Dream

I grew up in the Caribbean and always had a sharp curiosity about flavors. My mixing ways continued into adulthood where I introduced a variety of premium aged rums and spices to my juicy blends from the most exotic tropical fruits. I discovered the perfect balance between my favorite ingredients from my native islands. The fruits you'll enjoy while sipping our liqueurs flourished in my family’s backyard, from sugar cane to passion fruit to guava and even pineapples. I allowed nature to take its course, made the decision to chase my dreams and created the perfect tropical liqueur. 


Leap of Faith

In 2014 I walked away from ‘Corporate America’ and founded Caribbean Smooth, LLC to bring sensational tropical liqueurs to the world. I previously spent 25 years in the television industry as an award-winning producer and news executive at ABC television stations and ended my journalism career at CNN. Taking that leap of faith to start my own company from scratch was not easy but I was led through the encouragement of family and friends and just about every person whose path I've crossed. The journey has been inspiring and at the same time inspirational to many people. With the help of my team of very savvy business and industry professionals, we are well on our way to introducing some innovative products to the market. Take one sip of our liqueurs and you'll understand why we started calling it OoooWeee! Ooh-Yes! That's our exotic liqueurs getting your party started. Sip 'N Say OuOui!

 

Bottled Passion

The vision for our bottles started during the final development of our flagship passion fruit liqueur. The drink we designed for women had to have a bottle that captures the female mystique. We wanted it to look like a woman from any angle and at first sight it evokes intrigue.

We added some functionality into the packaging. With such a beautiful design, women can keep it for other uses. You can use our bottle as a vase for your favorite flower like a tulip or as a candle holder. Head Brand Designer Robert Konieczny gave it personality with sensual curves, strength and confidence with its black finish, bold stopper and romantic island sunset. Each bottle contains hand-painted elements and are baked to preserve that high-end finish. OuOui! is all about setting the mood and it starts when you first set eyes on the bottle that contains the liqueur that will create enjoyable and memorable moments for your occasions.

Taste of the Islands

Caribbean Smooth aims to serve you the smoothest and most flavorful liqueurs. OuOui! is a beautiful, unique and fun, real fruit premium liqueur that embodies the exciting lifestyle of the Caribbean. We stake our reputation on authenticity with our natural ingredients, spices and proprietary blend of premium rums. The truly unique experience starts with the seductive aromas just before the first sip that  transitions into an exotic splash of flavors when OuOui! hits your palate. A tropical warmth follows with the signature smoothness that differentiates OuOui! liqueurs.   

Ooo...We Get Your Party Started

“Took me back to my vacation in Jamaica.”  - Female 41-50

“I need that in my life!” – Female 21-30

“That’s special. That’s a winner.” – Female 31-40

“I would recommend it to all of my friends. The name and packaging is great. Great product. I loved everything about it.” – Female 21-30

“Very nice. Love it : )” – Female 31-40

“I would buy it.” – Female 31-40

“Rum is great but this is extraordinary!” – Male 31-40

“I would definitely purchase this drink if it were on the market.” – Female 21-60

 “I think it is a quality product & people will love it.” – Female 21-60

“I know lots of folks who would love it.” – Female 21-60

Designed for Women (Men also benefit)

Women looking for a quality beverage to help them temporarily escape the grind of a demanding lifestyle will find OuOui! appealing.  Whether as a ready to serve liqueur or as a loaded cocktail mixer, OuOui!'s versatility directly addresses  convenience for women who are living increasingly busier lives. Rum's warm and approachable natural taste as well as its versatility is ideally suited for that lifestyle. OuOui! is also comforting because of its distinct smoothness and inviting flavors. OuOui! brings island life to your lifestyle. It's our pleasure to bring you a smooth taste of the islands. 


Join Our Journey

Your donations will help us put these beautiful bottles of OuOui! Premium Liqueurs on store shelves. When you see those black bottles on the market you'll know your donation went directly to the purchase of our first batch. We will fill 22,000 bottles during our first production run with our passion fruit and guava pineapple liqueurs.

You can also support us through your family and friends by encouraging them to spread the good news about our liqueurs and beautiful bottles. Word of mouth and social media are among the best ways to help us build brand awareness and reach our goal. 

You're also Supporting Our Combat Veterans

Caribbean Smooth is partnering with Blanket of Freedom, a non-profit 501c(3) organization that is dedicated to providing services to veterans struggling with mental illness by providing an alternative to traditional treatment programs. Veterans get to tell their stories, set goals and solve their problems by participating in an Expressive/Drama Therapeutic program. Blanket of Freedom has revolutionized how non-traditional therapy works to assist veterans with personal development through dramatic art. We explore effective methods that modernize personal growth and development and consistency. Our charge is to create practical road maps that will help facilitate healthy life management. A portion of your contributions will be donated to this worthy and much needed nonprofit.


Where the Magic Starts

Manufacturing and bottling operations will take place near Tampa at Caribbean Distillers. Caribbean Distillers is an innovative alcoholic beverage company with expertise in rum and other spirits. With more than 70 years of experience in the alcohol industry Caribbean Distillers is the premier distillery in the region. Caribbean Distillers has a total production capacity of 10 million proof gallons per year.

Please sip responsibly.

story:
Hello! I'm Kerry. I create, design and wrap personalised chocolate gifts and favours for weddings, birthdays, hen parties and many more occasions. 

In 2004 my husband left the Royal Air Force, and so to bring in extra money to support our family, I started a business. Wrapped for You provides personalised chocolate gifts and favours for all sorts of special occasions and events. I have spent the last ten years running my business, and with your help I'm looking to take it to the next level.

My personalized chocolate gifts are high quality, inexpensive, and designed from my home with love and care.

Here are a few testimonials from satisfied customers:

"Absolutely perfect for our wedding favours with a few left over to scatter on the tables, and also an extra one as a keepsake from Kerry. What a thoughtful thing to do, thank you so much!"

"What service! Ordered the mini personalised wedding chocolates on Saturday and they were delivered Tuesday. They look lovely. One very happy customer, thank you so much!"

Take a look at my website: www.wrapped4you.co.uk

WHAT GIFTS CAN I BUY?

All sorts! Over the last ten years I've expanded my range to include wedding favours, Christmas chocolates, christening-themed chocolates and even chocolates for hen parties. At the moment they're all made of milk chocolate - but I intend to expand my flavour range to make mint chocolate gifts too.

HOW ARE THEY MADE?

I order the chocolates ready foil wrapped from English and Swiss suppliers and design the packaging. The gift boxes will be made by a company called Pendragon Packaging.

WHAT'S IN THEM?

All my gifts are made of milk chocolate. They're suitable for vegetarians, and they don't contain alcohol. I can include an ingredients list.  

CAN I BUY THEM?

Of course! You can buy my personalised chocolate gifts from any country in the world. I currently sell them on Etsy, on Amazon, and on my website: www.wrapped4you.co.uk.

WHAT DO YOU NEED THE MONEY FOR?

I have spent the last ten years perfecting my designs and working up a solid customer base. I want to expand my range of chocolates with custom fit packaging, allowing customers to send gifts in ready to give gift boxes, direct to the recipient with a handwritten note if they wish.

To take Wrapped for You up a notch, I'll need to create and invest in gift boxes of various sizes, packaging to make sure your delicious chocolates arrive safely, and pay VAT on any registered items or tools I buy during the manufacturing process.   

Expanding my small business is an ambitious feat, and I wouldn't be able to do it without the generous support of the Indiegogo community. Here's a breakdown of costs to show where your kind donations are needed:

RIGHT - I'M IN! HOW CAN I HELP?

I couldn't be more grateful to anyone who supports my business, whether it's pledging £1, £50 or sharing the word on social media.

To say thank you, I've put together a selection of rewards. Pledges start from as little as £1 and range from individual personalised bars, to occasion gift boxes - and even a year's supply of chocolate!

Take your pick from the choices on the right  =====>>


My chocolate gifts come in all sorts of different personalised wrappers (old favourites like Alice in Wonderland, super heroes, princesses and many other options!) so please send me an email once you've ordered to let me know which you'd prefer. My email address is: wrappedforyou@outlook.com

Please spread the word to your friends, family and on social media to help me raise the full amount.

Thank you for reading!

Kerry.

story:
Who am I? 

Hi! My name is Patti Le Day. This Indiegogo campaign is to raise funds for my new chocolate shop. I am purchasing Chocolate Visions from my former employers. Chocolate Visions is a small artisan confection shop in Scotts Valley, California.

What do I want?

Having my own shop has been a dream of mine since I was a little girl. I read my first issue of Bon Appetit magazine when I was 11. Every weekend I would spend my allowance on special ingredients, pans, or kitchen tools to make something from the newest issue.

                                                                


When everything I did was about baking and cake decorating, my specialty was chocolate desserts. I would make cakes, fillings, mousses, glazes and chocolate decorations. I absolutely love working with chocolate. 

What do I want to do?

It was only 5 years ago that I really got into making confections, after taking the Artisan Confections course in culinary school. I learned the technical aspects of it, like how to temper chocolate. After taking the artisan confections class EVERYTHING was about the candy!  Now, I think of myself as an artisan confectioner, and chocolate is still my favorite medium to work with.

                                              

                                            

I enjoy all aspects of artisan confectionery. I absolutely, positively love making caramel! To take sugar, cream and butter, and cook it down until it becomes this thick, creamy, golden pot of wonderfulness. My favorite part is when I pour it out of the pot. It ripples, folds, and pools into caramel-y goodness. It never gets old for me. I love making caramel. Put caramel and chocolate together and it’s a piece of heaven.

      =             +      


Did you say chocolate?

Chocolate Visions makes really good chocolates, some with local wines and olive oil. Salted caramels, marshmallows, toffee and fudge are a few more of the wonderful confections made in the shop. I want to expand on that, to introduce new flavor profiles and combinations.

   


Will there be anything new and exciting?

For the most part, the shop will stay the same. The change will be adding baked items to the menu. Cupcakes, cookies, cake pops, tarts, pies, custard, and anything else I can think up as a single serve dessert, has a chance of making it on the menu.

      

What about the community? 

Somewhere down the line I want to give back to the community. I would very much like to teach others what I do. I immensely enjoyed being a teaching assistant to my baking and artisan confections teacher when I was in culinary school. Being able to hold baking and confections classes in the shop would be really great. Having cookie and cupcake decorating parties would be another way of letting the community become a part of the shop.

       

    

What will the money be used for?

All of these hopes and dreams can’t really happen without your help. The funds raised on this campaign will go toward buying an oven and a vent so I can bake all of the cupcakes, cookies, tarts, etc.  A refrigerated case will be needed in order to have items that are perishable, like pastry cream and custards. A firemixer, though, not absolutely necessary, will come in very handy. A firemixer will enable me to make different caramels, toffees, and brittles without standing over a pot stirring….for several hours a day….for each batch! Finally, I need some cash for my initial operating expenses.  

Let's look at a pie chart!  (heh, heh, get it? pie chart! mmmm...pie)                                     

                              


And when the last cookie crumbles....?   

My having a chocolate and dessert shop will not end world hunger, control the climate, or stop wars. What it will do is fulfill the dream of an 11 year old girl who thought making dessert was the best thing ever. That little girl grew up to work as a baker, and finally went to culinary school. She worked hard, and loved every minute of it. Please help me to make that dream come true.

I sincerely thank you for any contribution you can make.

Sugar hugs and chocolate kisses,

Patti Le Day

P.S. Tell your friends and family about this campaign! They'll tell 2 friends, and so on, and so on.........

story:
Short Summary

My husband grew up in North Carolina and I worked in NC.  We love the state, the people, the food, and the drink.  We want to focus on combining southern cooking with great draft North Carolina beer.

The plan is to feature North Carolina brews. North Carolina is home to 132 breweries and brewpubs. We will be featuring a different NC brew every week, with discounts, and activities surrounding the brew during the on season. We will also be showcasing southern cooking for all you folks that like a little grub in your belly while you enjoy the refreshing taste of local beer. We would also like to increase the number of taps to accommodate for the local brews that our patrons take a particular liking to imbibe upon.
We will continue with many of the local favorites such as a full menu until closing, Tuesdays whole menu half price as well as the daft beers.
 
Small sample of what we intend to carry

Menu

Appetizers
Shrimp Boil Skewers
Buttermilk Chicken and Waffles
Boiled Peanut Hummus
Crab Cake Hush Puppies
Fried Pickles

Food
Fried Chicken with Sweet Potato fries
BBQ Sandwich with coleslaw
Crawdad and fried corn on the cob
Chicken Wings
Steakburgers
Cheesy Bacon fries
Wrangler cheeseburger with egg

 

 

Daft Beers

Natty Green Buckshot - Greensboro, NC

Duck Rabbit Milk Stout - Farmville, NC

Broomtail Acerbic IPA - Wrightsville Beach, NC

Broomtail Bucket List Blonde - Wrightsville Beach, NC

Foothills Hoppyum - Winston - Salem, NC

Mother Earth Sisters of the Moon IPA - Kinston, NC

Triangle IPA - Durham, NC

Triangle Habanero Pale Ale - Durham , NC

Lonerider Sweet Josie Brown - Raleigh, NC

Beer Army Fire in the Hole - Trenton, NC

Highland Gaelic Ale - Asheville, NC

Good Hops Reservation Wheat - Carolina Beach, NC

Good Hops Hopless Amber - Carolina Beach, NC

 

What We Need & What You Get

Right now we would like to purchase the Taproom in Carolina Beach.  It currently offers 30 taps, a great kitchen, 1000 sq feet of deck and a 1 block walk from the beach.

We are currently asking for $75,000 for the restaurant and taproom as a turnkey operation.  We intend to utilize our savings for operating expenses after the opening.  Leaving our 401k investments intact.

 

Who are we?

We are a husband and wife that  have been married for 9 years.  I grew up with a family that owned and operated a small town grocery store, café, and bar.  I have a degree in Business Administration / Finance from the University of Missouri and have worked as a Project Manager for the past 5 years in Information Technology.   My husband grew up in Charlotte, NC and graduated from Tusculum College in Tennessee.  He worked in multiple restaurants putting himself through college (including dishwashing).  We both understand the hard work and hours that will be required, but are extremely committed to creating a place where everyone feels welcome and safe, as well as giving back to Carolina Beach.
